mapper.insert: INSERT INTO DAILY_PLAN(NUM, SEQ, ACTIVITY_DATE, TEACHER_ID, LOCATION, TARGET, GRADE, SUBJECT, GOALS, MATERIALS, REG_DATE, UPD_DATE) VALUES(#{num}, #{seq}, #{activityDate}, #{teacherId}, #{location}, #{target}, #{grade}, #{subject}, #{goals}, #{materials}, SYSDATE(), SYSDATE())
mapper.update: UPDATE DAILY_PLAN SET SEQ = #{seq}, ACTIVITY_DATE = #{activityDate}, TEACHER_ID = #{teacherId}, LOCATION = #{location}, TARGET = #{target}, GRADE = #{grade}, SUBJECT = #{subject}, GOALS = #{goals}, MATERIALS = #{materials}, UPD_DATE = SYSDATE() WHERE NUM = #{num}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ACTIVITY(NUM, PLAN_NUM, ACTIVITY_TIME, CONTENT, NOTE, REG_DATE, UPD_DATE) VALUES(#{num}, #{planNum}, #{activityTime}, #{content}, #{note}, SYSDATE(), SYSDATE())
mapper.select: SELECT DAILY_PLAN.*, TEACHER.NAME AS INSTRUCTOR_NAME FROM DAILY_PLAN LEFT JOIN TEACHER ON (DAILY_PLAN.TEACHER_ID = TEACHER.ID) ORDER BY DAILY_PLAN.REG_DATE DESC LIMIT #{start}, #{count}
SELECT * FROM TEACHER WHERE NAME LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%')
SELECT DAILY_PLAN.*, TEACHER.NAME AS INSTRUCTOR_NAME FROM DAILY_PLAN LEFT JOIN TEACHER ON (DAILY_PLAN.TEACHER_ID = TEACHER.ID) WHERE DAILY_PLAN.NUM = #{num}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ACTIVITY_RECORD(NUM, CHILD_NUM, ACTIVITY_NUM, RECORD) VALUES(#{num}, #{childNum}, #{activityNum}, #{record})
mapper.select: SELECT AR.*, C.NAME AS CHILD_NAME, (SELECT ACTIVITY_DATE FROM DAILY_PLAN D WHERE D.NUM = A.PLAN_NUM) AS ACTIVITY_DATE, A.CONTENT AS ACTIVITY_CONTENT FROM ACTIVITY_RECORD AR LEFT JOIN CHILD C ON (AR.CHILD_NUM = C.NUM) LEFT JOIN ACTIVITY A ON (AR.ACTIVITY_NUM = A.NUM) WHERE AR.DEL_YN = 'N' ORDER BY AR.REG_DATE DESC LIMIT #{start}, #{count}
SELECT IFNULL(MAX(NUM) + 1, 0) FROM ACTIVITY_RECORD WHERE DEL_YN = 'N'
SELECT C.*, T.NAME AS INSTRUCTOR_NAME FROM COUNSEL C LEFT JOIN TEACHER T ON (C.INSTRUCTOR_ID = T.ID AND T.DEL_YN = 'N') WHERE C.DEL_YN = 'N' AND C.CHILD_NUM = #{childNum} ORDER BY NUM DESC

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO COUNSEL(NUM, CATEGORY, INSTRUCTOR_ID, COUNSEL_DATE, CHILD_NUM, COUNSEL_NOTE) VALUES(#{num}, #{category}, #{instructorId}, #{counselDate}, #{childNum}, #{counselNote})
mapper.select: SELECT H.* FROM HEALTH_CHECK H LEFT JOIN CHILD C ON (H.CHILD_NUM = C.NUM AND C.GRADUATED = 'N') WHERE H.CHILD_NUM = #{childNum} AND H.DEL_YN = 'N' ORDER BY REG_DATE DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO HEALTH_CHECK(NUM, HOSPITAL, CHILD_NUM, CHECK_DATE, CHECK_RESULT) VALUES(#{num}, #{hospital}, #{childNum}, #{checkDate}, #{checkResult})
